wikipedia_page.main: Edward Albert Derrick (born 6 August 1939) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Southern League for Merthyr Tydfil, Cambridge City, Hereford United and Worcester City. He also played two spells in the Football League for Newport County.

List of Hereford United F.C. seasons

response: Derrick was the father of Albert Derrick Jr, who also played football for Newport County.
* Albert Derrick (footballer, born 1908) (1908–1975), Welsh football forward
* Albert Derrick (footballer, born 1939), his son, Welsh football inside forward
